metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0283 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered affecting GitLab versions prior to 13.5. Anopen redirect vulnerability was fixed in GitLab integration with Jira thata could cause the web application to redirect the request to the attackerspecified URL.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
